nodes.text: Clan Deshra was a Mandalorian clan that was active during the Galactic War. Members of the clan reverse-engineered alien technology to develop their own retribution feedback shields almost a standard century before the conflict between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire broke out, and sold the shields to the highest bidder.
Clan Deshra was first introduced into Star Wars canon in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Starfighter expansion for the massively multiplayer online game, Star Wars: The Old Republic.
